summary: JAN 21'ST, 2019 MY CAR STALLED WHILE DRIVING.  PVC FROZE UP IN AIR INTAKE AND THE ORIFICE IN MY INTAKE MANIFOLD WAS BLOCKED.  BLEW REAR MAIN SEAL AND LOST ALL THE OIL IN THE CAR.  TIMING CHAIN SKIPPED WHEN NO OIL PRESSURE WAS PRESENT TO KEEP TIMING CHAIN TIGHT.  SERVICE BULLETIN 14882.  GM SAYS MY VIN IS NOT COVERED.  I HAVE PHOTOS AND VIDEOS OF PROOF OF ISSUE.  I AM FROM CANADA, SO I USED A GHOST STATE AND POSTAL TO GET THIS COMPLAINT POSTED.  I LIVE IN SMITHVILLE, ONTARIO, CANADA.  BRING GM TO COME GOOD FOR ALL THIS.
